summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Boards Inline Edit and Context Menu functionality. All features are working correctly: inline editing by clicking title, context menu with Renombrar/Duplicar/Mover/Eliminar options, validations (empty name, max 60 chars), delete confirmation modal, and toast notifications.
critical_code_review_comments: BoardsPage.jsx: Well-structured component with proper state management for editingBoardId, editingTitle, savingTitle, titleError
Backend PUT /api/boards/{id}: Properly validates and updates board title
Backend POST /api/boards/{id}/duplicate: Creates complete copy with new IDs for board, lists, and tasks
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Toast notifications provide good user feedback
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed boards during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Inline edit and context menu features are fully functional. Test file at /app/tests/test_boards_inline_edit.py can be reused for regression testing.

inline_edit_by_click.description: Clicking on board title converts it to editable input

save_with_enter.description: Pressing Enter saves the new name

empty_name_validation.description: Shows 'El nombre no puede estar vacío' error

context_menu_visible.description: ⋮ button appears on hover and opens dropdown menu

move_to_folder.description: 'Mover a carpeta' shows 'Función próximamente disponible' toast

delete_confirmation_modal.description: 'Eliminar tablero' opens confirmation modal with Cancel/Delete buttons

toast_notifications.description: Toast appears after successful rename, duplicate, and move actions
